intro.name: POINTMAN
intro.text: "I got something in the brush up here. It's a bicycle."

intro.name: POINTMAN
intro.text: "It looks like it's been rigged to carry cargo. It's marked with a 'FINDABLE_NUMBER'"

intro.name: POINTMAN
intro.text: "Could be trapped. Should I check it out?"

success.name: POINTMAN
success.text: "Okay, that was close, but I got it disarmed. Looks like we got a FINDABLE_NAME."

outcomes.failure:
As POINTMAN carefully lifts the bicycle frame there's a faint clicking sound.

At this distance the explosion is deafening.

When the smoke clears, what's left of POINTMAN's body lays torn apart on the ground.

LEADER snaps off one of his ID tags and notes the location.

The next few hours are spent burying him.

intro.name: POINTMAN
intro.text: "Wait, there's something here. I almost stepped on it."

intro.name: POINTMAN
intro.text: "It looks like a big pot that's been buried. Lid's marked with a 'FINDABLE_NUMBER'"

intro.name: POINTMAN
intro.text: "Could be trapped. Should I check it out?"

success.name: POINTMAN
success.text: "There's a fucking land mine in here! I disarmed it."

outcomes.failure:
As POINTMAN slowly rolls the old clay lid off the pot it explodes.

The ground absorbs most of the detonation, but the left side of POINTMAN's body is gone. Just gone. Totally gone.

LEADER snaps off one of his ID tags and notes the location.

The next few hours are spent burying what's left of him.
